citation.title: New records and a confirmation of three perlodid species in China, with additional notes and images of Rauserodes epiproctalis (Zwick, 1997) (Plecoptera: Perlodidae)

dataset.title: New records and a confirmation of three perlodid species in China, with additional notes and images of Rauserodes epiproctalis (Zwick, 1997) (Plecoptera: Perlodidae)

abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huo, Qing-Bo, Chen, Zhen-Ning, Kong, Xiang-Bo, Du, Yu-Zhou (2020): New records and a confirmation of three perlodid species in China, with additional notes and images of Rauserodes epiproctalis (Zwick, 1997) (Plecoptera: Perlodidae). Zootaxa 4808 (3): 455-474, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4808.3.3

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to these data, and has released them underCC0 Public Domain Dedication. Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes.

No known copyright restrictions apply. See Agosti, D., Egloff, W., 2009. Taxonomic information exchange and copyright: the Plazi approach. BMC Research Notes 2009, 2:53https://doi.org/10.1186/1756-0500-2-53for further explanation.
